p: In the District Court of this Third Judicial District of Washington Territory holding terms at Seattle.
In the matter of the application of Alice McKay for a writ of Habeas Corpus to obtain the person of her infant child Mary McKay} answer
Comes now petitioner herein and answer in the return of respondents to the writ of Habeas Corpus herein issued
Denies each and every material allegation in set said return setforth and

Petitioner alleges that she is a fit, competent and proper person to have charge of the said child, her control maintenance and education and that she is is an affectionate mother and and believes in the Protestant Christian religion, and desires to have her daughter educated and instructed in said religion instead of the Catholic religion in which respondents are now seeking to have her instructed and educated, wherefore petitioner pray
that she be awarded the custody of her said child.
